revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.4.2)
revision.text:
{{WikiProject Energy|class=start|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Switzerland|class=Start|importance=Low}} == Pen stock rupture == You are not up-the date.
The legal act under the federal tribunal is since longetime closed. The four parties have been punished to pay the amount about 3 Mio CHF (about 3.1 Mio US$ today) see final decicion of tribunal federal from january 19th of 2009 see [http://justools.ch/index.html?/bgeunpubl_liste/d/informationen/bgeunpubliziert/Jahr_2008/Entscheide_6B_2008/6B.311__2008.html here].
--[[User:Cosy-ch|Cosy-ch]] ([[User talk:Cosy-ch|talk]]) 16:15, 3 September 2012 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified 2 external links on [[Bieudron Hydroelectric Power Station]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=791374409 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20100225031738/http://www.grande-dixence.ch/energie/hydraulic/switzerland/bieudron-power-station-altitude.html to http://www.grande-dixence.ch/energie/hydraulic/switzerland/bieudron-power-station-altitude.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20110717113025/http://www.tunnelintelligence.com/safety-in-detail-167.html to http://www.tunnelintelligence.com/safety-in-detail-167.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, you may follow the instructions on the template below to fix any issues with the URLs. {{sourcecheck|checked=false|needhelp=}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 21:00, 19 July 2017 (UTC)
